name: Vaik%27anna_Silverlight
content:
Vaik'anna Silverlight was a Twi'lek female who lived on the planet Naboo during the Galactic Civil War. After the Battle of Yavin, she was employed in Theed by the Naboo noble Roric V`lia. The Twi'lek used to gossip with spacers about the activities of her boss that were related to the Imperial Weapon Research Facility, the Maulers criminals and the war between the Empire and the Gungans. Vaik'anna Silverlight once met Jar Jar Binks.
Vaik'anna Silverlight was a non-player character in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online roleplaying game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011. Vaik'anna Silverlight was added to the game with the "Publish 5" update, released on December 16, 2003.
